_description: To his mistress, a round — eight lines

BLAdd31922.First Lines: Downbery down now am I exild my lady froand no cause geuyn thee to…
BLAdd31922.Last Lines: …trustyng that dysdayn sone shalbe slayneand neuer more to remayne
BLAdd31922.Note: With music by William Daggere.At end, “Downbery ut supra.”

BLRoyApp58.Transcription:
Downbery down down hay downNow am I exyeld my lady fro& no
                    cause yevyn þer towher for to hyr I me complaynehey now hey now
                    hey nowtrystyng þis daysum shal be slaynneuer to
                    remaynhey now downbery down
